thread.title: Mathematician Extraordinairre
thread.title_full: Thread Logic reviewed by Mathematician Extraordinairre

author: Mathematician Extraordinairre
title: Mathematician Extraordinairre
text: This was my second order from Thread Logic - the first one was for about 20 shirts - and this one was for almost 100. The shirts arrived on time and look great. The 100% cotton polo shirts have lasted a while, too - without fading. I have had some for over a year and wear them regularly.
